name: Writing Prompt
author: Rob Skidmore

sections.description:
Get the daily writing prompt from The Write Practice right in your WordPress admin area. Is there a better way to facilitate consistent and creative writing? I submit that there is not.

Additional Info

** Planned Changes **
* Ability to dismiss prompt until an new one is posted
* Option to include link to The Write Practice article when you publish your post
sections.installation:
1. Upload writing-prompts folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open up a new post
  4. Write like crazy
sections.faq:
What is The Write Practice?

A crazy cool blog for writers with daily writing prompts. You should check it out.

Who built this crazy thing?

My name is Rob you can find me here.

Where can I ask you a question?

On ze tweetz my friend.
